author: Itachi
quote: It is foolish to fear what we have yet to see and know.

author: Itachi
quote: It is not wise to judge others based on your own perceptions and by their

author: Itachi
quote: Growth occurs when one goes beyond one’s limits.

author: Itachi
quote: Even the strongest of opponents always have a weakness.

author: Itachi
quote: Teachings that do not speak of pain have no meaning, for humankind cannot gain anything in return.

author: Itachi
quote: Knowledge and awareness are vague, and perhaps better called illusions.

author: Itachi
quote: However strong you become, never seek to bear everything alone. If you do, failure is certain.

author: Itachi
quote: Change is impossible in this fog of ignorance.

author: Itachi
quote: Those who turn their heads against their comrades are sure to die a terrible death. Be prepared.

author: Itachi
quote: He who forgives and acknowledges himself, that is what it truly means to be strong!

author: Itachi
quote: I never wanted to take out the Uchiha clan… But it was the only way to save my little brother.

author: Itachi
quote: Don’t cry Sasuke. Your big brother is here to protect you, no matter what happens.

author: Itachi
quote: That’s okay… Just as long as we can be together sometimes.

author: Itachi
quote: Once more just before I leave this world… I wish to hear him call me elder brother.

author: Itachi
quote: You and I are flesh and blood. I’m always going to be there for you even if it’s only as an obstacle for you to overcome. That’s what big brothers are for.

author: Itachi
quote: We are unique siblings. I am the barrier you must overcome, so you and I will continue to exist together.

author: Itachi
quote: You don’t have to forgive me… but no matter what happens to you from here on out… I will always love you…

author: Itachi
quote: You Will never have to forgive me. No matter what happens to you from here on out, I will always love you

author: Itachi
quote: Forgive me Sasuke... It ends with this.

author: Itachi
quote: You aren't even worth killing, foolish little brother.

author: Itachi
quote: Foolish brother, if you wish to kill me - hate me, detest me, and survive in an unsightly way. Run...

author: Itachi
quote: You're such a child. You talk of nothing but pipe dreams... there are times when people must make painful choices.

author: Itachi
quote: I always lied to you telling you to forgive me. I used these hands to keep you at distance… I did not want you to get involved. But now… I think you could have changed father and mother.

author: Itachi
quote: We do not know what kind of people we truly are until the moment before our deaths. As death comes to embrace you, you will realize what you are. That’s what death is, don’t you think?

author: Itachi
quote: Those who turn their hands against their comrades are sure to die a terrible death.

author: Itachi
quote: People’s lives don’t end when they die, they end when they lose faith.

author: Itachi
quote: In this moment, I am euphoric. Not because of any phony Shinobi’s blessing. But because I’m enlightened by my intelligence.

author: Itachi
quote: Any technique is worthless before my eyes.

author: Itachi
quote: No, it means to forgive yourself for what you aren’t able to do. Your comrades are there to make up for what you cannot do and to prevent you from ignoring things that you actually might have been able to do.

author: Itachi
quote: The village does have its dark side and its inconsistencies, but I’m still Konoha’s Itachi Uchiha.

author: Itachi
quote: I actually don’t think something like perfection exists. That is I think why we are born able to absorb things… and by comparing ourselves with something else we can finally head in a good direction.

author: Itachi
quote: No single thing is perfect by itself. That’s why we’re born to attract other things to make up for what we lack.

author: Itachi
quote: I’ll admit that you’re stronger than before. But because of that, you seem to have lost sight of what’s truly important. Now listen carefully. The people of the village, who once abhorred you, have begun to admire you. They think of you as a comrade. It’s because you fought hard for their acceptance. You once said it was everyone who cares about you who helped you get where you are now. If you forget others because you have power, and become arrogant and egotistical, you’ll eventually become just like Madara. No matter how powerful you become, do not try to shoulder everything alone. Becoming the Hokage doesn’t mean people will acknowledge you. But when the people acknowledge you, you can become Hokage. Never forget your friends.

author: Itachi
quote: It’s never been “The one who becomes Hokage will be acknowledged by everyone”, it’s “The one who is acknowledged by everyone, becomes the Hokage

author: Itachi
quote: Self-sacrifice… A nameless shinobi who protects peace within its shadow. That is a true shinobi.

author: Itachi
quote: We are humans, not fish.

author: Itachi
quote: Those who cannot acknowledge themselves, will eventually fail.

author: Itachi
quote: People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true. That’s how they define “reality.”

author: Itachi
quote: Obsessed with the organization, obsessed with the clan, obsessed with our lineage… A worthless compulsion that enslaves us and limits our capabilities, leading us to fear what you don’t understand.

author: Itachi
quote: So this time, for once, let me tell you one small truth.

author: Neji Hyuga
quote: Fear. That is what we live with. And we live it everyday. Only in death are we free of it.

author: Neji Hyuga
quote: Hinata… this is the unalterable difference in strength… the distinction that separates the elite from the failure. This is the unchangeable reality. From the moment you said you wouldn’t run, your defeat was inevitable. The only possible outcome was your present despair… Withdraw!

author: Neji Hyuga
quote: You are the strongest enemy I have ever fought.

author: Neji Hyuga
quote: No one can determine another’s destiny.

author: Neji Hyuga
quote: The difference between stupidity and genius, is that genius has its limits.

author: Neji Hyuga
quote: So you’re not going to withdraw? Then don’t blame me for what happens to you.

author: Neji Hyuga
quote: The heavens will not allow a pawn who can only seek victory at the cost of himself to advance…

author: Neji Hyuga
quote: about Gai : “He’s so childish. He acts like a seven-year-old! ”

author: Neji Hyuga
quote: about Lee and Gai: “As usual, I can’t keep up with their craziness. ”

author: Neji Hyuga
quote: People share only one common fate… death.

author: Neji Hyuga
quote: Because Naruto… you saved me from the darkness.

author: Neji Hyuga
quote: All this time I’ve been called a genius, so I cannot lose.

author: Neji Hyuga
quote: Sasuke’s out there right now, heading toward Orochimaru. We can’t allow such evil to take someone from our village… that is not our way.

author: Neji Hyuga
quote: Naruto… Sometimes, your eyes are even better than mine.

author: Neji Hyuga
quote: No one can determine another’s destiny. ” – Neji Hyuga

author: Neji Hyuga
quote: There’s no method but death to escape this horrible curse.

author: Neji Hyuga
quote: The curse represents a mark of the bird in a cage… It is… the symbol of being tied down to an inescapable destiny.

author: Neji Hyuga
quote: to Naruto: “These eyes of mine show me many things. One thing they’ve shown me…people’s limitations are set, fixed, and unchangeable. Only a fool wastes his time trying to become something he can never be! ”

author: Neji Hyuga
quote: Right now, Sasuke is in the darkness. The only one who can save him is you, Naruto.

author: Gaara
quote: A soul needs a purpose to live and so I concluded that my purpose was to kill everyone besides myself. I felt alive.

author: Gaara
quote: Naruto, just so you know, there will be a war to protect the Eight-tails and Nine-tails. In other words, you.

author: Gaara
quote: He knew pain like I did, and then he taught me that you can change your path.

author: Gaara
quote: If love is just a word, then why does it hurt so much if you realize it isn’t there?

author: Gaara
quote: We have walked through the darkness of this world, that’s why we are able to see even a sliver of light.

author: Gaara
quote: It’s too bad I don’t think of you as anything. If you get in my way, I’ll kill you.

author: Gaara
quote: Perhaps the companionship of an evil person is preferable to loneliness.

author: Gaara
quote: Family? Let me tell you what kind of link I have with them. They are just lumps of meat linked by hatred and murderous intent!

author: Gaara
quote: Peace under an illusion is not true peace. It’s only meaningful if the real world manages to accomplish it.

author: Gaara
quote: I want to be needed. This is what I’ve learned from meeting and fighting Uzumaki Naruto.

author: Gaara
quote: In order to escape a road of solitude, one has to work hard and forge a new path with their own power.

author: Gaara
quote: One day, I’d like to become something precious to others.

author: Gaara
quote: For the sake of the ninja world and as the Kazekage, I will guard you with my life.

author: Gaara
quote: I think of you as a friend. I used to think ‘friend’ was just another word—nothing more, nothing less. But when I met you, I realized what was important was the word’s meaning.

author: Gaara
quote: Now there’s something I understand a little better—hate, sadness, even joy.

author: Gaara
quote: People cannot win against their loneliness.

author: Gaara
quote: Up until now, my bonds with others have only been ones of hatred and murder, but seeing him fight so hard made me wonder what a bond really is.

author: Gaara
quote: Just because someone is important to you, it doesn’t necessarily mean that that person is good.

author: Gaara
quote: You’re the same then. When you feel the honor of your idol under scrutiny, you become enraged as if it were your own honor being questioned. The more precious your idol is to you, the harder you fight for him.

author: Gaara
quote: You can make a rain of 1,000 needles. I will make it rain blood.

author: Gaara
quote: There are no enemies here because we’ve all suffered at Akatsuki’s hand! So there is no Suna, no Iwa, no Konoha, no Kiri, and no Kumo! There are only shinobi!

author: Gaara
quote: What does pain feel like?

author: Gaara
quote: You have the same eyes as I do—the eyes filled with hatred and death that long for strength, just like mine.

author: Gaara
quote: I finally understand. I’m alone. I won’t believe in anyone or love anyone. I’m alone.

author: Gaara
quote: I am a relic they want to get rid of, so why do I exist and live?

author: Gaara
quote: I took the life of the woman I was supposed to call mother in the process of being born. In order to become the world’s strongest shinobi, I became the incarnation of sand.

author: Gaara
quote: Your eyes tell me how badly you wish to kill the one who put you through the hell called loneliness.

author: Gaara
quote: I shall kill you. I will not cease to exist.

author: Gaara
quote: We’ve fought world wars for our own nations, our own villages. We’ve hurt one another. We’ve hated one another. That hatred bred a lust for power, and that lust for power created me.

author: Gaara
quote: He was the one who taught me to deepen my bond with my people.

author: Gaara
quote: If all other people exist to magnify that love, then there is no more a splendid universe than this one.

author: Gaara
quote: Thanks to him, I was able to regain my true self.

author: Gaara
quote: I would love only myself and fight for only myself.

author: Gaara
quote: If you’re truly prepared to take up the mantle of a Kage, then as Sasuke’s friend, you know what you have to do.

author: Gaara
quote: This is where it all starts for me. Starting with this small bond. I too want to become someone who is needed, instead of a weapon that is feared.

author: Gaara
quote: That village has him—the one who cherishes a friend’s bond more than anyone I know. Naruto Uzumaki—knowing him and the friends he holds so dear, they will overcome this disaster and grow even stronger from it.

author: Gaara
quote: I know him well. He takes too many risks when it comes to his friends. That’s why.

author: Gaara
quote: I hated this world, and all the people in it. I wanted to destroy it with my own hands.

author: Gaara
quote: I was his enemy, yet he wept for me! I hurt him, yet he called me his friend! He saved me! My enemy, my fellow Jinchuuriki. He suffered the same pain as me, yet bore no ill will!

author: Gaara
quote: Our enemies are after the friend who saved my life! If they take him, if we hand him over, our world is finished! I want to protect him, and I want to protect our world! But I’m too young to protect it all on my own! All of you lend me your aid!

author: Sasuke
quote: My dream doesn’t exist in the future. It lies in the past. That’s the only place it exists.

author: Sasuke
quote: Why do you always treat me like such a pest?

author: Sasuke
quote: Naruto, I know you’re special, but I am more special than you!

author: Sasuke
quote: Having too many bonds causes one to lose focus—weakening their strongest wish, their greatest desire.

author: Sasuke
quote: What I have is not a dream, because I will make it a reality.

author: Sasuke
quote: If that’s how it is, I’ll just have to sever that bond.

author: Sasuke
quote: I hate a lot of things, and I don’t particularly like anything.

author: Sasuke
quote: I’m trembling with excitement.

author: Sasuke
quote: I’m going to restore my clan and kill a certain someone.

author: Sasuke
quote: From now on, we just go our separate ways.

author: Sasuke
quote: That which is destroyed can always be fixed and rebuilt.

author: Sasuke
quote: First thing in the morning and they’re already driving me nuts.

author: Sasuke
quote: I have told you before, I’m an avenger. I don’t care about this test, Chunin, or whatever. ‘Am I strong?’ That’s the answer I want.

author: Sasuke
quote: Tears and rain fall down on my face. My body is unable to stay, yet my heart is unwilling to leave.

author: Sasuke
quote: This is the path I walk. Not you or anyone can change that.

author: Sasuke
quote: As for me, I have absolutely no reason to love her. And likewise, I can see no reason why she would love me.

author: Sasuke
quote: I don’t know. My body just moved. There was no time to think.

author: Sasuke
quote: The gap between us hasn’t narrowed in the slightest. Why?

author: Sasuke
quote: I have long since closed my eyes. My only goal is in the darkness.

author: Sasuke
quote: I understand now. Even if I must take the devil’s fruit, I must gain power. I am an avenger.

author: Sasuke
quote: I know the four of us have worked together. And for a while, I thought I could choose that path instead. But in the end, I’ve decided on revenge. That’s always been my purpose of living.

author: Sasuke
quote: Your laughing voices sound like contempt and mocking me now, I will change those laughs to screams and wails.

author: Sasuke
quote: It’s too late, nothing you can say will change me!

author: Sasuke
quote: I’m going to kill you and every last person in your beloved village! It’s time to make your choice! Kill me and become a hero, or die at my hand and become another one of my victims!

author: Sasuke
quote: Don’t worry, this will be over in five seconds.

author: Sasuke
quote: If anyone who criticizes my way of life were to come forward, I’d turn around and kill every single one of their loved ones, so that they, too, can grasp what it’s like to experience this hatred of mine.

author: Sasuke
quote: To accept and adopt Itachi’s intention would be childish.

author: Sasuke
quote: Like I’d die. I won’t die. The reason Itachi lived for—I can’t—I won’t let it end here.

author: Sasuke
quote: I’m not the same as you. I’m travelling a path the rest of you can’t follow.

author: Sasuke
quote: Loneliness—you can’t compare it to what you feel after you get scolded by your parents.

author: Sasuke
quote: I never want to see another important person die in front of me again.

author: Sasuke
quote: I will acknowledge that you are strong because you are someone who knows the same pain of loneliness as I do; and that pain makes a person stronger.

author: Sasuke
quote: I’m going to the battlefield. I won’t let this village and my brother be wasted!

author: Sasuke
quote: I don’t want peace bought with Itachi’s life.

author: Sasuke
quote: If I haven’t the courage to face this demon, how can I ever hope to face him?

author: Sasuke
quote: While it’s true I once desired destruction and the only goal I had was revenge, things are different now.

author: Sasuke
quote: What I desire is to reform the entire shinobi world. What I am calling for, what I am bringing forth, is revolution.

author: Sasuke
quote: I spared your life on a whim, nothing more. But this time, my whim is telling me to finish what I started.

author: Sasuke
quote: They’re all laughing. You’re laughing at the cost of Itachi’s life laughing together, completely ignorant of everything.

author: Sasuke
quote: No man chooses evil because it is evil; he only mistakes it for happiness—the good he seeks.

author: Sasuke
quote: Just shut up for once! What the hell do you know about it? It’s not like you ever had a family in the first place! You were on your own right from the beginning, what makes you think you know anything about it? I’m suffering now because I had those ties. How on earth could you possibly understand what it feels like to lose all that?

author: Sasuke
quote: I see. I don’t even understand even one of these problems.

author: Sasuke
quote: How could I lose to that freak?

author: Sasuke
quote: If you want to ridicule me as a brat swayed by his emotions, go ahead.

author: Sasuke
quote: Was she having fun in her little make-believe fantasy of true love?

author: Sasuke
quote: Naruto, don’t let your dream die.

author: Sasuke
quote: Instead of wasting all of that time chasing me, you should have been training.

author: Sasuke
quote: Weaknesses? Listen, he was full of weaknesses. He was a good-for-nothing, but he pulled himself up with his own strength and became Hokage.

author: Sasuke
quote: You don’t need to understand who Naruto is now, you need to know the Naruto who made it all the way here.

author: Sasuke
quote: The soul of shinobi remains the same—even for your kid.

author: Pain
quote: Even the most ignorant, innocent child will eventually grow up as they learn what true pain is. It affects what they say, what they think… and they become real people.

author: Pain
quote: Too many people have died here, their pain is what helped me grow up.

author: Pain
quote: How can you say that you will never change? That you will not change, no matter how great the pain you face? Can you continue believing in yourself forever? Can you guarantee it? Can you have such faith in yourself?

author: Pain
quote: Learn to embrace the fear of feeling about what it’s like to contemplate what it is to know true pain.

author: Pain
quote: We are but men, drawn to act in the name of revenge that we deem to be justice.

author: Pain
quote: Let me ask you this: How will you confront this hatred in order to create peace?

author: Pain
quote: Just by living, people hurt others without even realizing it.

author: Pain
quote: Love breeds sacrifice… which in turn breeds hatred. Then you can know pain.

author: Pain
quote: You think you’re the only ones who matter, You think you can put off death.

author: Pain
quote: Religion, ideology, resources, land, spite, love or just because, No matter how pathetic the reason, it’s enough to start a war.

author: Pain
quote: There is no such thing as real peace, It’s impossible as long as we live in this accursed world.

author: Pain
quote: If there is justice in revenge, then that same justice will breed only more revenge and trigger a cycle of hatred.”

author: Pain
quote: Dying like trash, Never ending hatred, Pain that never heals, That is war, This is what we must face.

author: Pain
quote: Just because you understand them doesn’t mean you can come to an agreement, That’s the truth.”

author: Pain
quote: Vengeance is the product of that hate and so death follows, But in death there is only more death.

author: Pain
quote: Justice comes from vengeance but justice only breeds more vengeance.”

author: Pain
quote: If you don’t share the pain with someone, you will never understand the pain.”

author: Pain
quote: Even children are forced to grow up in the face of pain.

author: Pain
quote: Human nature pursues strife.”

author: Pain
quote: Pain Is The Only Way To Teach, Pain Is The Only Solution To Peace. If You Want To Know Pain, You Need To Understand Pain.

author: Pain
quote: Pain is the way to bring peace.”

author: Pain
quote: So Long As Humanity Exists, Hate Will Also Exist.”

author: Pain
quote: Love is the reason why there is pain.

author: Pain
quote: Eventually, time will pass and the pain will heal.

author: Pain
quote: When I Had Nothing And No One, I Always Had Pain.”

author: Pain
quote: Those Who Do Not Understand True Pain Can Never Understand True Peace.”

author: Pain
quote: I want you to feel the pain, think about pain, know the pain and accept pain”

author: Pain
quote: When we lose someone precious to us, hate is born.

author: Pain
quote: Do you understand pain a little now? If you don’t share someone’s pain, you can never understand them.

author: Pain
quote: Sometimes you must hurt in order to know, fall in order to grow, lose in order to gain because life’s greatest lessons are learned through pain.
